pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Saturday, July 16, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Scarborough, Ontario

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend Junior Carnival and deliver brief remarks.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend service at Malvern Methodist Church.

Closed to media

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Ahmadiyya Muslim Jama’at in Canada’s Annual Convention (Jalsa Salana).

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
